channel.title: entrepreneur doubts on Ramon Suarez's curiosity lead learning life

item.title: Am I a Solution Looking for a Problem?
item.description: I’m struggling with what to do about my knowledge of coworking and the assets I’ve built about it. At the same time I cannot help but think that I’m trying too much to develop coworking related projects. There’s this inner struggle between turning the page and forgetting about it, and using these assets to build some side projects and sources of income. My coworking book is something I’m proud of, that is helping a lot of people, and that is still bringing some revenue every month.
